price: Saa Da no, yεbεbͻ onipa adwuma a, odi too n’anim ne deε εkaa akyire (a obuu n’ani guu soᴐ) ho amaneε.
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
